segments.first_frame_description: The frame opens with a medium close-up of a dark-skinned woman wearing maroon scrubs and a matching surgical cap, framed slightly right of center. She wears black-rimmed glasses and a thin gold necklace. Her left hand is raised slightly to her chest. Behind her, a small inset video box in the top center shows a close-up of a bathroom shelf filled with various bottles and containers (shampoos, serums, supplements), suggesting treatment overload. The text 'IT'S GONNA BE' is overlaid near the bottom on the woman's shirt.

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "It's going to be too many treatments and it's going to be too expensive."
shots.action: The woman speaks directly to camera, gesturing to the treatment overload.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), hair products

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "Grab our Rosemary DHT Blocker."
shots.action: The woman gestures and speaks about the high cost of hair loss treatments.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), $100 bill

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "It combines natural DHT blocking with root strengthening power."
shots.action: The woman introduces the alternative product (Rosemary DHT Blocker) and a detached hand displays the pouch.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), hand holding 'lunavo Rosemary' pouch
shots.dialogue: It combines natural DHT blocking with root strengthening power.
shots.composition: Medium close-up, product overlay showing the 'lunavo Rosemary' pouch.

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "It combines natural DHT blocking with root strengthening power, including the ones I just mentioned."
shots.action: The woman explains the compound nature of the product, while the visual inset highlights the active ingredients.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), rosemary sprigs and hair roots graphic
shots.dialogue: including the ones I just mentioned.
shots.composition: Medium close-up; rosemary sprigs and root diagram still life inset
shots.context_environment: Medical office; visual representation of ingredients
shots.ambiance_colour_lighting: Warm, natural tones in the inset contrast with the bright foreground.

segments.first_frame_description: The woman remains centered, smiling confidently, now wearing the text 'INCLUDING THE ONES'. A large, looping green circular checkmark animation appears above her head, indicating approval or a successful step in dealing with hair loss. Her hands are placed over her chest in a gesture of sincerity. The background of the medical office is clearly visible, featuring a white examination table and large window on the right.

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "If you still see the orange cart, that means they have not sold out yet. These usually sell out pretty fast..."
shots.action: The woman confirms the product's benefits and composition, with a graphic reinforcing the positive message.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), checkmark graphic
shots.dialogue: If you still see the orange cart, that means they have not sold out yet.

shots.audio: Woman's voiceover: "...just because of the extremely low price they're offering it at."
shots.action: The woman encourages viewers to purchase quickly before the product runs out, highlighted by the 'Out of Stock' graphic.
shots.subject: Woman (healthcare worker), 'Out of Stock' signs, red arrow graphic
shots.dialogue: just because of the extremely low price they're offering it at.
shots.composition: Medium close-up; animated arrow and 'Out of Stock' warning label inset.
shots.context_environment: Medical office, retail shelf visualization in inset
shots.ambiance_colour_lighting: High contrast between the white setting and red warning signs/arrow.
shots.camera_motion_positioning: Static; inset video shows slight camera movement/scrolling across shelves.
